statements: SELECT * FROM waste_treatment_facilities ORDER BY facility_id DESC;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE capacity_kg > 1000;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, capacity_kg FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Incinerator';
SELECT * FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE capacity_kg BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, capacity_kg FROM waste_treatment_facilities ORDER BY capacity_kg DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Incinerator' ORDER BY facility_name ASC
SELECT facility_name, capacity_kg FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE capacity_kg > 5000
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, capacity_kg FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE facility_type IN ('Recycling', 'Landfill')
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, capacity_kg FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE capacity_kg < 10000 ORDER BY capacity_kg DESC
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, capacity_kg FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Composting' AND capacity_kg BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY facility_name
SELECT * FROM waste_treatment_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_treatment_facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT plan_id, plan_date, plan_details FROM waste_management_plan WHERE plan_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, capacity FROM waste_treatment_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY facility_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_plan WHERE plan_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY facility_id, plan_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM waste_treatment_facilities GROUP BY facility_name HAVING total_capacity > 5000;

SELECT wt.facility_name, wp.plan_date, wp.plan_details FROM waste_treatment_facilities wt JOIN waste_management_plan wp ON wt.facility_id = wp.facility_id WHERE wt.capacity > 500 ORDER BY wp.plan_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_treatment_facilities ORDER BY facility_name ASC LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT * FROM facilities;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, capacity FROM facilities WHERE capacity > 100;

SELECT facility_name, capacity, waste_type_name FROM facilities JOIN facility_waste_capacity ON facilities.facility_id = facility_waste_capacity.facility_id JOIN waste_types ON facility_waste_capacity.waste_type_id = waste_types.waste_type_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_types WHERE waste_type_name LIKE 'H%' ORDER BY waste_type_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY facility_id ASC
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM facilities WHERE facility_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM facility_waste_capacity WHERE waste_type_id IN (2, 3) ORDER BY facility_id DESC

SELECT f.facility_name, w.waste_type_name, fc.capacity FROM facilities f INNER JOIN facility_waste_capacity fc ON f.facility_id = fc.facility_id INNER JOIN waste_types w ON w.waste_type_id = fc.waste_type_id WHERE fc.capacity >= 50 ORDER BY f.facility_name ASC

SELECT f.facility_name, w.waste_type_name, SUM(fc.capacity) AS total_capacity FROM facilities f INNER JOIN facility_waste_capacity fc ON f.facility_id = fc.facility_id INNER JOIN waste_types w ON w.waste_type_id = fc.waste_type_id GROUP BY f.facility_name, w.waste_type_name HAVING SUM(fc.capacity) > 100
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM waste_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT wf.facility_name, wt.waste_type FROM waste_facilities wf JOIN facility_types ft ON wf.facility_id = ft.facility_id JOIN waste_types wt ON ft.type_id = wt.type_id;
SELECT collection_id, facility_id, collection_date, collected_amount FROM waste_collection ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM waste_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC;

SELECT facility_name, facility_types.type_id, waste_type FROM waste_facilities JOIN facility_types ON waste_facilities.facility_id = facility_types.facility_id JOIN waste_types ON facility_types.type_id = waste_types.type_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_facilities, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, collection_date, collected_amount FROM waste_facilities JOIN waste_collection ON waste_facilities.facility_id = waste_collection.facility_id ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location, capacity FROM WasteFacilities ORDER BY facility_id DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_type FROM WasteMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM WasteInventory WHERE quantity > 1000;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM WasteManagementPlans ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM WasteFacilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT material_type, disposal_method FROM WasteMaterials WHERE material_source = 'Industrial';

SELECT facility_name, material_type, quantity FROM WasteFacilities JOIN WasteInventory ON WasteFacilities.facility_id = WasteInventory.facility_id JOIN WasteMaterials ON WasteInventory.material_id = WasteMaterials.material_id;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM WasteManagementPlans WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
